name: PDMP
title: US Prescription Drug Monitoring Program (PDMP)
description: US Prescription Drug Monitoring Program (PDMP) FHIR IG

resource.name: PDMP Bundle - History Result
resource.description: This profile constrains a Bundle resource to carry the history details and/or processing outcome for a PDMP request

resource.name: PDMP Bundle - Request Message
resource.description: This profile constrains a Bundle resource for use as the request message to a PDMP--with a Parameters resource as the bundle's message focus.

resource.name: PDMP Bundle - Response Message
resource.description: This profile constrains a Bundle resource for use as the response message from a PDMP--with a Parameters resource as the message's message focus.

resource.name: PDMP Code System - Patient Relationship (Temporary)
resource.description: This code system defines a relationship between a RelatedPerson and the patient

resource.name: PDMP Extension - Activity Period
resource.description: The date period (start/end) of the responses returned by the PDMP.

resource.name: PDMP Extension - Header Timestamp
resource.description: The date the request was sent to the PDMP Responder.

resource.name: PDMP Extension - LME
resource.description: LME - Lorazepam Milligram Equivalent.  The lorazepam dose (mg) equivalent to the sedative dose of the prescription as dispensed.

resource.name: PDMP Extension - MME
resource.description: MME - Morphine Milligram Equivalent.  The quantity of morphine (mg/day, except for fentanyl patchs use mcg/hr) equivalent to the daily opioid dose for the prescription as dispensed.

resource.name: PDMP Extension - Prescription Refill Number
resource.description: The refill number of the prescription dispensed.

resource.name: PDMP Extension - Prescription Transmission Method
resource.description: The method by which the prescription was trasmitted to the dispensing or administering party.

resource.name: PDMP MedicationAdministration
resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the MedicationAdministration resource when used by a Prescription Drug Monitoring Program (PDMP) to return an individual's medication administration history.

resource.name: PDMP MedicationDispense
resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the MedicationDispense resource when used by a Prescription Drug Monitoring Program (PDMP) to return an individual's medication dispensation history.

resource.name: PDMP Message Definition - Request
resource.description: Message requesting information from a PDMP facilitator system about medication dispensations and administrations

resource.name: PDMP Message Definition - Response
resource.description: Response returning information from a PDMP facilitator system about medication dispensations and administrations

resource.name: PDMP MessageHeader - Request Operation
resource.description: This profile constrains a MessageHeader resource for use in a PDMP request data bundle. A Parameters resource is the focus.

resource.name: PDMP MessageHeader - Response Operation
resource.description: This profile constrains a MessageHeader resource for use in a PDMP response data bundle. A Bundle resource is the focus.

resource.name: PDMP Operation Get PDMP History
resource.description: Operation returning an individual patient's PDMP history

resource.name: PDMP Organization - Pharmacy
resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the Organization resource when used by a Prescription Drug Monitoring Program (PDMP) to represent a dispensing pharmacy.

resource.name: PDMP Parameters - Request Operation
resource.description: This profile tailors the Parameters resource to convey PDMP Request inputs.

resource.name: PDMP Parameters - Response Operation
resource.description: This profile tailors the Parameters resource to convey PDMP Request outputs.

resource.name: PDMP Patient
resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the Patient resource when used by a Prescription Drug Monitoring Program (PDMP) to request or return an individual's medication dispenssation history.

resource.name: PDMP Value Set - Patient Relationship
resource.description: This value set contains codes defining a relationship between a RelatedPerson and the patient

resource.name: PDMP Value Set - Prescription Transmission Method
resource.description: This value set contains codes for the methods by which a prescription was received by the dispensing or administering party.

resource.name: PDMP Value Set - Species Type
resource.description: This value set contains codes identifying the species type (human vs veterinary)

resource.name: pdmp-bundle-history-result-1
resource.description: Example of a Bundle resource used to transmit a patient's PDMP history

resource.name: pdmp-bundle-request-message-1
resource.description: Example of a PDMP request message

resource.name: pdmp-bundle-response-message-1
resource.description: Example of a PDMP response message

resource.name: pdmp-client
resource.description: This resource defines the expected capabilities of the PDMP Client actor when conforming to the PDMP IG and It is expected that it will be used in conjunction with the US Core CapabilityStatement. Together they describe the complete list of actual profiles, RESTful operations, and messaging capabilities supported by PDMP Clients. PDMP Client requirements may also be impacted by the rules of local jurisdictions or other contextual requirements.

resource.name: pdmp-history-input-parameters-1
resource.description: Example of a Parameters resource used to request a patient's PDMP history

resource.name: pdmp-history-input-parameters-2-minimum
resource.description: Example of the minimal Parameters resource population to request a patient's PDMP history

resource.name: pdmp-history-output-parameters-1
resource.description: Example of a Parameters resource used to respond to a request a patient's PDMP history

resource.name: pdmp-history-output-parameters-2-minimal-history
resource.description: Example of minimal population of a Parameters resource used to respond when a patient has PDMP history

resource.name: pdmp-history-output-parameters-3-error-retrieving-data
resource.description: Example of population of the Parameters resource when a processing exception causes no PDMP history to be returned

resource.name: pdmp-medadmin-1
resource.description: Example of a PDMP medication administration

resource.name: pdmp-meddispense-1
resource.description: Example of a PDMP medication dispensation record

resource.name: pdmp-patient-1
resource.description: Example of a PDMP patient - as submitted in a request or returned in a response

resource.name: pdmp-patient-2-veterinary
resource.description: Example of a PDMP patient representing an animal

resource.name: pdmp-pharmacy-1
resource.description: Example of a PDMP dispensing pharmacy

resource.name: pdmp-server
resource.description: This resource defines the expected capabilities of the PDMP Server actor when conforming to the PDMP IG and It is expected that it will be used in conjunction with the US Core CapabilityStatement. Together they describe the complete list of specific profiles, RESTful operations, and messaging capabilities supported by PDMP Servers. PDMP Server requirements may also be impacted by the rules of local jurisdictions or other contextual requirements.

resource.name: PMIX Code System - Species Type Code (Temporary)
resource.description: This code system defines codes identifying the species type of a patient (human vs veterinary)

resource.name: PMIX Transmission Form Of Rx Origin Code System (Temporary)
resource.description: Code indicating how the pharmacy received the prescription - exerpted from PMIX_NIEM_4.0_Domain_Extension_Schema.xsd

resource.name: relatedperson-2-veterinary
resource.description: Example of the owner of an animal patient
